thread.title: Coming Enhancements to Keep 3D CHGT’s Hot Printing Portal on Industry Forefront
thread.title_full: Coming Enhancements to Keep 3D CHGT’s Hot Printing Portal on Industry Forefront

author: admin
title: Coming Enhancements to Keep 3D CHGT’s Hot Printing Portal on Industry Forefront
text:
Companies mentioned in this article: Changing Technologies, Inc. 
HOUSTON -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- Changing Technologies, Inc. (OTCBB: CHGT) plans several future enhancements to its new online 3D printing portal, 6d3d.com , which debuted last month to a rousing start and is still maintaining its blistering pace of visits, uploads and downloads. CHGT intends to add an interactive advisor tool consisting of easy-to-follow visual guides and popups designed to help visitors navigate the 3D printing process. 
“3D printing mistakes can cost considerable time, material and money,” said CHGT CEO Marco Valenzuela. “We’ve gotten a tremendous reception following our highly successful portal launch, but we’re by no means finished with the site. The launch was just the first step. With this valuable tool, users will now have an easier time completing complex work. And it will allow us to build a strong reputation throughout the global 3D printing community as a ‘one-stop shop’ for users of all skill levels, greatly enhancing our already promising revenue prospects.” 
The upcoming 3D printing advisor tool would offer portal users suggestions on printing materials and processes based on unique project needs and requirements. 
6d3d.com continues to draw heavy site traffic and interest, showing there is strong demand in the rapidly growing global 3D printing community . 
For more information on CHGT, please visit www.changingtechno.com . 
For more information on 6 th Dimension Technologies, visit http://www.6d3d.com . 
About Changing Technologies, Inc. 
Changing Technologies, Inc. (CHGT) is an emerging technology company focused on developing innovative concepts to bring to consumers. It recently created a new subsidiary — 6 th Dimension Technologies — to pursue additional growth areas and market needs in the booming 3D printing sector. A forward-thinking company working to be at the forefront of the next generation of consumer-based technology, CHGT is positioning itself to leverage global demand for the latest technological advances and services the company offers. Changing Technologies, Inc. is in the cutting-edge technology sphere alongside companies like Voxelijet AG ( VJET ), Arcam AB ( AMAVF ), and ExOne Co. ( XONE ).
